definition: new character (in textbook)/character that is unfamiliar or not yet studied
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: If I can't think of an English word, I use a word or phrase that means the same thing.
sentences.chinese: 記生字時，在腦中想象一個這個字可以被運用的情境。

sentences.english: I use flashcards to remember new English words.
sentences.chinese: 使用有圖有字的閃卡影象生字。

sentences.english: Rhyming stories for phonics practice. Stories combine phonically decodable words with high frequently words.
sentences.chinese: 高頻率生字和押韻故事有助兒童學習英語拼音。

sentences.english: He has need to memorize new English wor daily.
sentences.chinese: 他每天需要記英語生字。

sentences.english: Copy vocabulary on p. 28 of the textbook twice on homework notebook A .
sentences.chinese: 抄寫教科書第28頁第七課生字二遍。

sentences.english: When you meet a new word, write it down lest you should forget it.
sentences.chinese: 當你遇到了生字，要把它寫下來以免忘了。

sentences.english: I use rhymes to remember new English words.
sentences.chinese: 我會使用押韻的方式來記住生字。

sentences.english: I find the meaning of an English word by dividing it into parts that I understand.
sentences.chinese: 將一個生字拆成一些我所知道的部份來了解其含義。

sentences.english: Copy each new character in lesson 11 for 1 line; and make 2 phrases.
sentences.chinese: 抄寫課後生字，每個生字1行，並組兩個詞。

sentences.english: Copy each new character in lesson 11 for 1 line; and make 2 phrases.
sentences.chinese: 抄寫課後生字，每個生字1行，並組兩個詞。

sentences.english: Make sure that you know these words.
sentences.chinese: 你務必要認識這些生字。

sentences.english: I was busy looking up all the new words of the lesson in my dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我忙著在字典裏查本課所有的生字。

sentences.english: Rhyming familiar stories for phonics practice. Stories combine phonically decodable words with high frequently words.
sentences.chinese: 高頻率生字和押韻故事有助兒童學習英語拼音。

sentences.english: When we find a new word, we can look it up in our dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 當我們發現生字的時候，我們可以查字典。

sentences.english: What a dictionary does is ( to) help the students to find out the meaning and the usage of new words.
sentences.chinese: 字典的作用是幫助學生查生字的詞義和用法。

sentences.english: I cannot absorb so many new words.
sentences.chinese: 我不能吸收這麼多生字。

definition: to pronounce a word after mentally processing its spelling/(phonics) blending
new word (in textbook)/word that is unfamiliar or not yet studied/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]
(of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
character with two or more readings
